Title(s): The Brome Play of Abraham and Isaac
_description: The Brome Play of Abraham and Isaac — 466 lines, mostly in cross-rhymed quatrains

YaleBei365.First Lines:
Fader of hevyn omnipotentWith all my hart to the I
                    call…
YaleBei365.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu that weryt the crown of thorneBryng vs all to heuyn
                    blysse
